name: Lightmare (___Karlo, bobojo, PiotrPe0212, ImZary)
description:
Lightmare

Lightmare is a creepy platformer about "zary" who is stuck in a horrible nightmare, where he cannot wake up, & he needs to get out of this horrible nightmare, to save his life that is the only thing he has left.

or is it?

controls : 

A/D to move left or right or the right & left arrow keys.

Space to Jump

Space to Wall jump near a wall

L to use the flashlight to disable enemies from moving for 3s

that's it. Have fun!
